level.heading: High-pressure boiler operating engineer license required.
level.text: ยง28-413.1 High-pressure boiler operating engineer license required. It shall be unlawful to operate any high-pressure steam boiler for any purpose whatsoever, in the city of New York or in connection with any vessel on the waters in and around the city not subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, unless such boiler is operated by or under the direct and continuing supervision and in the presence of a person having a high pressure boiler operating engineer license under the provisions of this article.
